Handle video production independently, including direct, shoot and edit video content

Cooperate with production or programming team to edit video for online use
Occasional outdoor video shooting and managing of event live on social platforms

Requirements

Minimum 2 years’ work experience as social media video or video editor
More experienced candidates will be considered for senior editor position
Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages (e.g. Premiere, After Effects, Avid Media Composer, Lightworks)
Creative mind and storytelling skills
Good knowledge and understanding of latest social media trends
Highly responsible, and have good time management with good team player
Fresh graduates are welcome as well.
